short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fajr Extension - Your Reliable Tool for Accurate Prayer Times

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Fajr extension helps you stay connected to your daily prayers with precise prayer times based on your location. You can select from multiple calculation methods to ensure the times align with your preferences. The Fajr extension is designed to work offline, giving you reliable access to prayer times wherever you are.

Additionally, it overrides the new tab to provide a seamless view of your prayer settings, ensuring you always stay informed and prepared for your prayers. You can synchronize your profile from Fajr Calendar website by granting cookies permission to the extension.
